participant_1.background:
My dream car is a rolls royce ghost.
I often shop for shoes and watches.
I currently work for a watch dealer.
I like shopping.
My family does not support my career choices.

participant_2.background:
I was adopted at a young age to an older couple.
I am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma.
My father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates.
I enjoy working with my hands and love gardening.

content.text: So what's your dream car?
I'm not sure I have one. I've never been much of a car person.
Oh, really? I love cars. I'm really into watches and shoes, too.
That's cool. I'm not really into fashion, but I do enjoy shopping.
Me too! I love going to the mall and browsing all the different stores.
Me too! I love trying on new clothes and seeing what looks good on me.
What do you do for a living?
I work in a garden center. I love working with my hands and I love being outdoors.
That sounds really nice. I'm a watch dealer. I really enjoy my job, but my family doesn't support my career choices.
Why not?
They think it's a waste of time and that I should get a real job.
That's too bad. You should do what you love, regardless of what other people think.
I know, but it's hard when your own family doesn't support you.
I'm sorry to hear that. But I think you're doing great.
Thanks.
So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I like to go shopping, go to the movies, and spend time with my friends.
Me too! I love going to the movies. What's your favorite movie?
I don't really have a favorite movie. I like a lot of different movies.
Me too! I love watching movies from all different genres.
